snippet: Changes at the Clinton Correction Facility include the elimination of a prison block allowing inmates some freedoms and more oversight of guards on overnight shifts.
abstract: New York State Corrections Dept outlines new security measures at Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora, NY, after prison break of murderers David Sweat and Richard W Matt.
lead_paragraph: Changes at the Clinton Correction Facility include the elimination of a prison block allowing inmates some freedoms and more oversight of guards on overnight shifts.

headline.main: Tighter Security at Prison in Dannemora, N.Y., After Escapes
headline.print_headline: Security Is Tightened at Prison After Escapes
